rows.label: tlk70000014_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Laura, Hikari! I'm glad you
came to talk to me again!

rows.label: tlk70000014_05_msg0002
rows.name:
You always help me figure out
what to do. I'm really glad I
can talk to you like this.

rows.label: tlk70000014_05_msg0003
rows.name:
There's so much I want to ask you
about Leon and Azzaro, too...

rows.label: tlk70000014_05_msg0004
rows.name: What's it like spending time with them?

rows.label: tlk70000014_05_msg0005
rows.name:
And what sort of friends
are they? I want to get
better at making friends...

rows.label: tlk70000014_05_msg0006
rows.name:
So I thought I'd give it a
shot and do something that
a real friend would do.

rows.label: tlk70000014_05_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm not sure how well it'll help
me express my true feelings...

rows.label: tlk70000014_05_msg0008
rows.name:
But, well, I'd be really happy
if you got some use out of it.
